content: It's that time of the year again, to share an oldie but goodie: "the merry FHIR choir": https://vimeo.com/113076733 - from the 2014 DevDays meeting. Sure makes one long for in-person FHIR community meetings. Perhaps the fall '21 DevDays meeting. All the best for 2021!
Ah thanks, there goes my plausible deniability :joy: All the best to you too René and thanks for your many DevDay stunts. And of course all the best to everyone else as well.
All the best for 2021:fire: and the coming Chinese Lunar New Year of Ox:ox:
The Year of the (Red)Ox? I like that
Yeah:big_smile:
I have to say, FHIR is just about the only part of 2020 that's been a non-stop thrill!
fhirworks:glowing_star: for the holidays:boom:
